message.body: Yo Gabi! If you're around this weekend why don't we get together and create a little music. Either at my home during the day or at the rock sun clock at oak ledge before sunset with some drums and a horn. Also I talked to Jess and she's cool with hooking up the 6 th grade jazz band for you. I'm also going to try and get you as a jazz band assistant though I can't promise that quite yet. Either way lets hook up soon with some instruments. Be well!
Sweet, im in southern vt but ill be back tomorrow afternoon, id love to jam. Talk to you tomorrow.
Theres a balagan rehearsal 3-5, you are invited! Then we should jam at 5
Cool sounds like fun. What's the address?
Its the basement of the building w red doors at the corner of church and maple. Im sure youll hear some horns so shouldnt be hard to find
